title: Stateside Puerto Ricans
summary: Stateside Puerto Ricans[2][3] (Spanish: Puertorriqueños de Estados Unidos), also ambiguously Puerto Rican Americans (Spanish: puertorriqueño-americanos,[4][5] puertorriqueño-estadounidenses),[6][7] or Puerto Ricans in the United States, are Puerto Ricans in the United States proper (the 50 states and the District of Columbia), who were born in or trace family ancestry to the US territory of Puerto Rico.[8][9]
